title: New: Danny Brown – #HottestMC
body:
Without a doubt, the debut **Danny Brown** LP, _Old_, is my most anticipated release of 2013.

_XXX_ was a marvel; overblown, silly, crude and at times utterly tasteless, it managed to be all those things whilst being scathingly poignant. Balancing these two strong elements is hard, and _XXX_ didn’t perhaps always have both eyes on the ball. _Old_, at least in reference to what **Brown** has to say about it, looks set to be a more focused body of work. _#HottestMC _ironically won’t appear in the LP, however it’s only exciting me further.
